dialogues.speaker: Narrator
dialogues.text: In a world where magic has disappeared, the land of Eldoria is plagued by darkness and despair.

dialogues.speaker: Eira
dialogues.text: I've heard rumors of a hidden prophecy that can restore the light of magic to our world. I must find it before it's too late.

dialogues.speaker: Arin
dialogues.text: Eira, I'm not sure this is a good idea. We don't even know if the prophecy exists.

dialogues.speaker: Eira
dialogues.text: That's exactly why we have to try. The fate of Eldoria depends on it.
